summary: Adds a spell which allows you to transmute any precious gem to its flawless version.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new spell to the game. With this spell you can transmute any precious gem (i.e. amethyst, diamond, emerald, garnet, ruby and sapphire) to its flawless version. To learn this spell, you will first have to get the spellbook, which can be bought from Farengar Secret-Fire in Whiterun or Enthir in the College of Winterhold

Change log:
-Uploaded missing scripts
-Deleted unnecessary elements with tessnip
author: Mutak94
